hadiths.text: Narrated Jundub:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Amongst the nations before you there was a man who got a wound, and growing impatient (with its pain), he took a knife and cut his hand with it and the blood did not stop till he died. Allah said, 'My Slave hurried to bring death upon himself so I have forbidden him (to enter) Paradise

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا ذُكِرَ عَنْ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ
chapter.eng-name: What has been said about Bani Israel
